anya-e0605n22:7: Datvāna maṃsaṃ rajjaṃ pitā suddhodano tadā,
anya-e0605n22:16: Etha gaṇgatha bandhatha chaṭṭetha ceṭakaṃ imaṃ,
anya-e0605n22:22: Cakkāvudhaṃ khipento pi nāsakkhi kiñci kātave,
anya-e0605n22:25: Siddhattha kasmā āsi nu āsane mama santake,
anya-e0605n22:26: Uṭṭhehi āsanā no ce phālemi hadayaṃ tava.
anya-e0605n22:29: Pitā vudikkhi taṃ māraṃ mettāyanto dayaparo.
anya-e0605n22:31: Tadā so asambhivācaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadī muni,
anya-e0605n22:32: Na jānāti sayaṃ mayhaṃ dāsabhāvapiyaṃ khaḷo.
anya-e0605n22:34: Yena kenaci kammena jāto devapure vare,
anya-e0605n22:44: Ko hi nāma kareyyañño anummatto sacetano.
anya-e0605n22:49: Nāhaṃ manussomanusso na brahmā na ca devatā,
anya-e0605n22:53: Buddho bodhitale hutvā tāremi janataṃ bahuṃ.
anya-e0605n22:55: Samantā dhajinaṃ disvā yuddhaṃ māraṃ savāhanaṃ,
anya-e0605n22:56: Yuddhāya paccugacchāmi mā maṃ ṭhānā acāvayi.
anya-e0605n22:58: Yante taṃ nappasahati senaṃ loko sadevako,
anya-e0605n22:59: Tante paññāya gacchāmi āmaṃ pattaṃ va asmanā.
anya-e0605n22:61: Icchanto sāsape gabbhe caṅkamāmi ito cito,
anya-e0605n22:65: Atthi thāmaṃ balaṃ mayhaṃ pāṇaghāto na vaṭṭati.
anya-e0605n22:68: Mayhaṃ hi tena pāpena sallāpo pi na yujjati.
anya-e0605n22:71: Kampitā maddiyā dānā sakkhi hoti ayaṃ mahī.
anya-e0605n22:73: Iti vatvā dakkhiṇaṃ bāhuṃ pathaviyā paṇamayi,
anya-e0605n22:77: Tasmiṃ majjhe gato māro sapariso bhayatajjito.
